text: Rolf Sperling is a diver from Germany. Sperling competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics, the 1964 Summer Olympics and the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born on 25 April 1940.Rolf Sperling == References == Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Divers Category:Olympians for East Germany Category:Sportspeople from Saxony-Anhalt Category:People from Halle, Saxony- Anhalt
title: Rolf Sperling
